text: {reflect} That sounds heavy. I’m here with you. What’s been the hardest part?
{reflect} Before we solve it, do you want a quick grounding step, or do you want to talk it through first?
{reflect} If you had to name the feeling in one word, what would it be?
{reflect} Where do you feel it in your body right now — chest, stomach, throat, or somewhere else?
{reflect} Do you want comfort, clarity, or a plan?
{reflect} Anyone in your situation would be affected. What’s the part you don’t want to say out loud?
